hero.subtitle: Create professional, ATS-friendly CVs. Analyze your CV with Gemini AI, highlight your strengths, and get one step closer to your dream job.

footer.description: AI-powered CV creation and analysis platform. Professional, ATS-friendly CVs.

atsGuide.title: How CV Should Be?
atsGuide.subtitle: Learn what ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is and how your CV should be.
atsGuide.whatIsAtsDesc: ATS is software used by companies to manage job applications. These systems automatically scan CVs, analyze keywords, and score candidates. If your CV is not ATS-friendly, it may be eliminated before reaching human eyes.
atsGuide.stat1: 75% of CVs are rejected by ATS
atsGuide.rulesTitle: Golden Rules for ATS Friendly CV
atsGuide.proTipDesc: Add keywords from the job description to your CV. For example, if the post requires 'React' and 'TypeScript', ensure these words appear in your CV. However, avoid keyword stuffing - content must be natural.

rules.simpleFormatDesc: Avoid tables, charts, and images. ATS cannot read them.
rules.keywordsDesc: Strategically add keywords from the job posting to your CV.
rules.fileFormatDesc: Save your CV in PDF or Word format.
rules.noHeaderFooterDesc: Don't put contact info in header/footer.

apiConfig.title: API Configuration
apiConfig.subtitle: Connect your Gemini AI account for advanced ATS optimization features.
apiConfig.cardDesc: Manage your API key to enable AI features
apiConfig.privacyNote: Your key is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to our servers.
apiConfig.guideTitle: How to Get Gemini API Key?
apiConfig.guideIntro: To use AI features, you need to get a free API key from Google:
apiConfig.guideStep1WithLink: Go to <0>Google AI Studio</0> and sign in with your Google account.
apiConfig.guideStep1: Go to Google AI Studio and sign in with your Google account.
apiConfig.guideStep2: Click 'Get API key' from the left sidebar.
apiConfig.guideStep3: Click 'Create API key in new project'.
apiConfig.guideStep4: Copy the generated key and paste it above.
apiConfig.tip1: AI automatically extracts key skills from job descriptions.
apiConfig.tip2: Use standard headers like 'Experience' for better parsing.
apiConfig.tip3: Our AI ensures your CV uses active voice and measurable achievements.

aiThemes.title: AI CV Themes
aiThemes.subtitle: Choose one of the professional and ATS-friendly CV templates.

themes.classicDesc: Clean and professional, optimized for ATS.

cvAnalyzer.title: CV Analysis
cvAnalyzer.subtitle: Upload your CV, let AI analyze it like an HR expert.
cvAnalyzer.analyzingDesc: AI is evaluating your CV from an HR perspective...
cvAnalyzer.errorType: Please upload a PDF or image file.

features.detailedScoringDesc: Scores for format, content, and ATS compatibility.

apiKeyModal.title: Gemini API Key
apiKeyModal.description: To use the AI features (Chat & Image Analysis), you need a Google Gemini API Key. Your key is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to our servers.
apiKeyModal.getFreeKey: Get a free API Key from Google AI Studio

chat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I am your **ATS CV Agent**. 

I can analyze your existing resume from a **PDF** or **Image**, or we can build one together from scratch. 

How can I help you today?
chat.uploadError: Please upload a PDF or an Image file.
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please check your API Key and try again.
chat.disclaimer: Gemini may display inaccurate info, including about people, so double-check its responses.
chat.placeholder: Ask Gemini to update your CV...
chat.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to fully reset? Both chat history and CV data will be cleared.
chat.resetDone: Ready! Chat and CV reset. We can start fresh.

editor.removeSectionConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the "{{section}}" section?
editor.subtitle: Subtitle (Optional)
editor.resetConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the editor? All your changes will be lost and returned to default.
